8BCN.SG.short_name: BCPG Public Company Ltd. Reg. S
8BCN.SG.summary: BCPG Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of electricity from solar cells in Thailand. It also generates electricity from wind and geothermal power, as well as invests in alternative energy business. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. BCPG Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited.

ABM-R.BK.summary: Asia Biomass Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, trades in biomass in Thailand and internationally. The company also manufactures wood chips and biomass pellets. In addition, it provides transportation services. The company was formerly known as Thai Joss Powder Industrial Co., Ltd. Asia Biomass Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ABM.BK.summary: Asia Biomass Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, trades in biomass in Thailand and internationally. The company also manufactures wood chips and biomass pellets. In addition, it provides transportation services. The company was formerly known as Thai Joss Powder Industrial Co., Ltd. Asia Biomass Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACE-R.BK.long_name: Absolute Clean Energy Public Company Limited
ACE-R.BK.summary: Absolute Clean Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates biomass, natural gas, municipal solid waste, and solar energy power plants in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Biomass Power Plants, Solid Waste Power Plant, Natural Gas Power Plant, and Solar Energy Power Plant. As of December 31, 2019, it has 14 power plants with installed capacity of 212.18 megawatts. Absolute Clean Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BCPG-R.BK.summary: BCPG Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of electricity from solar cells in Thailand. It also generates electricity from wind and geothermal power, as well as invests in alternative energy business. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. BCPG Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited.

BCPG.BK.summary: BCPG Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of electricity from solar cells in Thailand. It also generates electricity from wind and geothermal power, as well as invests in alternative energy business. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. BCPG Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited.

BGRIM-R.BK.summary: B.Grimm Power Public Company Limited, an energy company, engages in the development, financing, construction, and operation of green-field power plants in Thailand, Laos, and Vietnam. It operates through two segments, Electricity Generating and Other Businesses. The Electricity Generation segment generates and distributes electricity for the government sectors and industrial users. The Other Businesses segment provides maintenance and operating services for power plants. The company generates electricity through co-generation, hydro, solar, wind, diesel, waste-to-energy, and natural gas. As of December 31, 2019, it had 46 power plants with a total capacity of 2,896 megawatts. The company was founded in 1878 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BGRIM.BK.summary: B.Grimm Power Public Company Limited, an energy company, engages in the development, financing, construction, and operation of green-field power plants in Thailand, Laos, and Vietnam. It operates through two segments, Electricity Generating and Other Businesses. The Electricity Generation segment generates and distributes electricity for the government sectors and industrial users. The Other Businesses segment provides maintenance and operating services for power plants. The company generates electricity through co-generation, hydro, solar, wind, diesel, waste-to-energy, and natural gas. As of December 31, 2019, it had 46 power plants with a total capacity of 2,896 megawatts. The company was founded in 1878 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BPP-R.BK.summary: Banpu Power Public Company Limited engages in the power business. It invests in power and renewable energy projects; and produces and sells solar and wind power. The company is also involved in the production and sale of steam; and power trading activity. It operates in Thailand, China, Lao People's Democratic Republic, Vietnam, and Japan. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Banpu Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Banpu Public Company Limited.

BPP.BK.summary: Banpu Power Public Company Limited engages in the power business. It invests in power and renewable energy projects; and produces and sells solar and wind power. The company is also involved in the production and sale of steam; and power trading activity. It operates in Thailand, China, Lao People's Democratic Republic, Vietnam, and Japan. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Banpu Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Banpu Public Company Limited.

CKP-R.BK.summary: CK Power Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity and steam in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Generation of Electricity from Hydroelectric Power, Generation of Electricity from Solar Power, and Generation of Electricity from Thermal Power. As of December 31, 2019, it had a total installed capacity of 2,167 megawatt (MW). The company operates 2 hydro power plants with a capacity of 1,900 MW in the Laos People's Democratic Republic; a solar power plant with a capacity of 8 MW located in Pakthongchai, Thailand; a solar power plant with a capacity of 6 MW in Dan Khun Thot, Thailand; a solar power plant with a capacity of 8 MW located in Mae Chan, Thailand, 5 solar rooftop and a solar farm power plants with a capacity of 6.73 MW; and 2 thermal power plants with the capacity of 117.5 MW and 120 MW located in Bangpa-in, Thailand. It also provides consulting and other services related to electricity generating projects. CK Power Public Company Limited was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CKP.BK.summary: CK Power Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity and steam in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Generation of Electricity from Hydroelectric Power, Generation of Electricity from Solar Power, and Generation of Electricity from Thermal Power. As of December 31, 2019, it had a total installed capacity of 2,167 megawatt (MW). The company operates 2 hydro power plants with a capacity of 1,900 MW in the Laos People's Democratic Republic; a solar power plant with a capacity of 8 MW located in Pakthongchai, Thailand; a solar power plant with a capacity of 6 MW in Dan Khun Thot, Thailand; a solar power plant with a capacity of 8 MW located in Mae Chan, Thailand, 5 solar rooftop and a solar farm power plants with a capacity of 6.73 MW; and 2 thermal power plants with the capacity of 117.5 MW and 120 MW located in Bangpa-in, Thailand. It also provides consulting and other services related to electricity generating projects. CK Power Public Company Limited was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EA-R.BK.summary: Energy Absolute Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes methyl ester biodiesel and glycerol products in Thailand. It also offers high speed diesel oil and glycerin products. In addition, the company provides electricity through solar and wind power plants; and consulting services in the project regarding alternative electric energy. Additionally, it operates charging stations; and researches and develops electricity vehicles and lithium-ion polymer batteries, as well as manufactures and distributes palm oil. The company was formerly known as Suntech Palm Oil Ltd. and changed its name to Energy Absolute Public Company Limited in 2008. Energy Absolute Public Company Limited was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EASTW-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited
EASTW-R.BK.summary: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and manages water distribution pipeline systems in the eastern seaboard area of Thailand. It produces and supplies tap water; provides waste treatment, waterworks management, operation and maintenance management, and engineering services; recycles water; supplies raw water; and offers renewable energy management services. Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EASTW.BK.long_name: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited
EASTW.BK.summary: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, develops and manages water distribution pipeline systems in the eastern seaboard area of Thailand. It produces and supplies tap water; provides waste treatment, waterworks management, operation and maintenance management, and engineering services; recycles water; supplies raw water; and offers renewable energy management services. Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ECGF.F.summary: Electricity Generating Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity to government sector and industrial users primarily in Thailand, the Philippines, and Australia. The company operates in two segments, Electricity Generation and Other Businesses. It generates electricity from various resources, such as natural gas, liquefied natural gas, coal, biomass, hydro, solar, wind, geothermal, and fuel cell. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 28 operating power plants with total equity contracted capacity of 5,475 MW in 6 countries in the Asia Pacific region; and 2 projects under construction with total equity contracted capacity of 171 MW. It also provides operation, maintenance, engineering, and construction services to power plants, petrochemical plants, oil refineries, and other industries. Electricity Generating Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EGCO-R.BK.summary: Electricity Generating Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity to government sector and industrial users primarily in Thailand, the Philippines, and Australia. The company operates in two segments, Electricity Generation and Other Businesses. It generates electricity from various resources, such as natural gas, liquefied natural gas, coal, biomass, hydro, solar, wind, geothermal, and fuel cell. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 28 operating power plants with total equity contracted capacity of 5,475 MW in 6 countries in the Asia Pacific region; and 2 projects under construction with total equity contracted capacity of 171 MW. It also provides operation, maintenance, engineering, and construction services to power plants, petrochemical plants, oil refineries, and other industries. Electricity Generating Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EGCO.BK.summary: Electricity Generating Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity to government sector and industrial users primarily in Thailand, the Philippines, and Australia. The company operates in two segments, Electricity Generation and Other Businesses. It generates electricity from various resources, such as natural gas, liquefied natural gas, coal, biomass, hydro, solar, wind, geothermal, and fuel cell. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 28 operating power plants with total equity contracted capacity of 5,475 MW in 6 countries in the Asia Pacific region; and 2 projects under construction with total equity contracted capacity of 171 MW. It also provides operation, maintenance, engineering, and construction services to power plants, petrochemical plants, oil refineries, and other industries. Electricity Generating Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

EP-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited
EP-R.BK.summary: Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited engages in the solar power plant business. The company was formerly known as Eastern Printing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited in April 2020. Eastern Power Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

F1P.F.summary: TTW Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells treated water in Thailand. The company supplies water to the Provincial Waterworks Authority in the Amphur Nakorn Chaisri, Amphur Sam Pran, and Amphur Budha Monthon areas of Nakhon Pathom; and Amphur Muang and Amphur Kratumban areas of Samut Sakhon under the water purchase agreement. It is also involved in the management of water production and distribution systems, and waste water treatment systems; and operation and maintenance of water supply project. The company was formerly known as Thai Tap Water Supply Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTW Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

F1P2.F.summary: TTW Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells treated water in Thailand. The company supplies water to the Provincial Waterworks Authority in the Amphur Nakorn Chaisri, Amphur Sam Pran, and Amphur Budha Monthon areas of Nakhon Pathom; and Amphur Muang and Amphur Kratumban areas of Samut Sakhon under the water purchase agreement. It is also involved in the management of water production and distribution systems, and waste water treatment systems; and operation and maintenance of water supply project. The company was formerly known as Thai Tap Water Supply Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTW Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

GPSC-R.BK.long_name: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited
GPSC-R.BK.summary: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of electricity, steam, and water for industrial purpose in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Independent Power Producer, Small Power Producer, and Others. It generates electricity through solar, hydropower, and cogeneration power plants. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GPSC.BK.long_name: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited
GPSC.BK.summary: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of electricity, steam, and water for industrial purpose in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Independent Power Producer, Small Power Producer, and Others. It generates electricity through solar, hydropower, and cogeneration power plants. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GULF-R.BK.long_name: Gulf Energy Development Public Company Limited
GULF-R.BK.summary: Gulf Energy Development Public Company Limited produces and sells electricity, steam, and cold water to public and private clients in Thailand and internationally. It operates in three segments: Power Business, Consulting Business, and Infrastructure Business. The company generates electricity through gas-fired and renewable power projects under the independent power producers, small power producers, and very small power producers programs. It has a total gross installed power capacity of 11,910 MW. The company also undertakes infrastructure projects; and operates in natural gas related businesses, including procurement, and marketing and trading of natural gas. In addition, it engages in the trading activities; and the provision of managerial, technical, and supporting services. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

META-R.BK.summary: Meta Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a contractor, developer, and operator of renewable energy power plants in Asia. It operates through four segments: Engineering Systems Installation, Energy and Coal, Power Plant for Alternative in Renewable Energy, and Business Development and Finance Advisory. The company is involved in the engineering, procurement, construction, and installation of solar power, biomass, wind power, and geothermal projects. It also offers building engineering systems installation and maintenance services; and investment consultancy services, as well as operates as a coal agent. The company was formerly known as Vintage Engineering Public Company Limited and changed its name to Meta Corporation Public Company Limited in May 2018. Meta Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

PDI-R.BK.summary: Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited engages in the renewable energy and other businesses in Thailand and internationally. It focuses on producing energy from renewable energy sources, including solar, wind power, hydropower, biomass, and biogas. The company operates six solar farms located in Prachinburi, Samut Sakhon, and Khon Kaen; and a solar farm in Kha-Ne-Jue district, as well as solar farms in Asia. It is also developing solar projects with 30 MW in Japan. In addition, the company offers property services; and trades in various base metals and by-products. Further, it is involved in the hotel and real estate activities. Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PDI.BK.summary: Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited engages in the renewable energy and other businesses in Thailand and internationally. It focuses on producing energy from renewable energy sources, including solar, wind power, hydropower, biomass, and biogas. The company operates six solar farms located in Prachinburi, Samut Sakhon, and Khon Kaen; and a solar farm in Kha-Ne-Jue district, as well as solar farms in Asia. QU5A.F.summary: Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited engages in the renewable energy and other businesses in Thailand and internationally. Further, it is involved in the hotel and real estate activities. Padaeng Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

RATCH-R.BK.summary: Ratch Group Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity in Thailand, Australia, and internationally. It operates through Domestic Electricity Generating, Renewable Energy, and International Power Projects segments. The company generates electricity through natural gas, coal, and fuel oil, as well as solar power, wind power, and biomass renewable projects. As of December 31, 2019, it had a total installed capacity of 8,655.07 megawatts. Ratch Group Public Company Limited also provides power plant operation and maintenance services, as well as invests in the power energy business. The company was formerly known as Ratchaburi Electricity Generating Holding Public Company Limited and changed its name to Ratch Group Public Company Limited in April 2019. Ratch Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

RATCH.BK.summary: Ratch Group Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity in Thailand, Australia, and internationally. It operates through Domestic Electricity Generating, Renewable Energy, and International Power Projects segments. Ratch Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

It operates through Domestic Electricity Generating, Renewable Energy, and International Power Projects segments. The company generates electricity through natural gas, coal, and fuel oil, as well as solar power, wind power, and biomass renewable projects. As of December 31, 2019, it had a total installed capacity of 8,655.07 megawatts. Ratch Group Public Company Limited also provides power plant operation and maintenance services, as well as invests in the power energy business. The company was formerly known as Ratchaburi Electricity Generating Holding Public Company Limited and changed its name to Ratch Group Public Company Limited in April 2019. Ratch Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

ROJNA-R.BK.long_name: Rojana Industrial Park Public Company Limited
ROJNA-R.BK.summary: Rojana Industrial Park Public Company Limited engages in the generation and sale of electricity from solar cell system in Thailand. The company operates through Real Estate Development and Related Service, Electricity Generating, and Production and Distribution Industrial Water segments. It is also involved in the development of industrial estates. In addition, the company produces and distributes industrial water; offers waste water treatment services; and provides medical services. Rojana Industrial Park Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ROJNA.BK.long_name: Rojana Industrial Park Public Company Limited
ROJNA.BK.summary: Rojana Industrial Park Public Company Limited engages in the generation and sale of electricity from solar cell system in Thailand. The company operates through Real Estate Development and Related Service, Electricity Generating, and Production and Distribution Industrial Water segments. It is also involved in the development of industrial estates. In addition, the company produces and distributes industrial water; offers waste water treatment services; and provides medical services. Rojana Industrial Park Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAAM-R.BK.long_name: SAAM Energy Development Public Company Limited
SAAM-R.BK.summary: SAAM Energy Development Public Company Limited develops and sells renewable energy power plants in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Development Service and Distribute of Electricity. It procures project lands and provides related services, as well as develops and manages in solar energy power plants. SAAM Energy Development Public Company Limited was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAAM.BK.long_name: SAAM Energy Development Public Company Limited
SAAM.BK.summary: SAAM Energy Development Public Company Limited develops and sells renewable energy power plants in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Development Service and Distribute of Electricity. It procures project lands and provides related services, as well as develops and manages in solar energy power plants. SAAM Energy Development Public Company Limited was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCG-R.BK.summary: Sahacogen (Chonburi) Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity and steam in Thailand. It operates a cogeneration power plant with a capacity to produce 214 megawatts of electricity and 96 tons of steam per hour. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

SCG.BK.summary: Sahacogen (Chonburi) Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity and steam in Thailand. It operates a cogeneration power plant with a capacity to produce 214 megawatts of electricity and 96 tons of steam per hour. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

SCN-R.BK.summary: Scan Inter Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, primarily engages in trading natural gas through vehicle service stations in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Gas Related Business, Car Dealer and Spare Parts, Renewable Energy, and Others. The Gas Related Business segment engages in trading gas through natural gas for vehicle (NGV) service stations; filling gas of industrial compressed natural gas for industrial applications; providing service for quality improvement of natural gas; and transporting natural gas. This segment is also involved in the design, installation, repair, and maintenance of natural gas dispenser equipment; and design and installation of gas system in vehicles, as well as the testing of vehicle cylinders. It owns 13 NGV service stations. The Car Dealer and Spare Parts segment trades in cars and related spare parts. The Renewable Energy segment operates a solar power plant. The Others segment trades in liquid carbon dioxide, engine oil, and lubricants; and operates convenient stores, as well as provides transportation, warehousing, and distribution services.it also exports battery and glass. Scan Inter Public Company Limited is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

SPCG-R.BK.summary: SPCG Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity from solar energy in Thailand and internationally. The company has 36 solar farm projects with a total installed capacity of 260 megawatts. It is also involved in engineering, procurement, and construction, as well as operation, maintenance, and monitoring of solar farms. In addition, it manufactures, trades in, and installs solar roof for residences, small buildings, and medium-large buildings; and steel or metal roofing sheets. SPCG Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SPCG.BK.summary: SPCG Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity from solar energy in Thailand and internationally. The company has 36 solar farm projects with a total installed capacity of 260 megawatts. It is also involved in engineering, procurement, and construction, as well as operation, maintenance, and monitoring of solar farms. In addition, it manufactures, trades in, and installs solar roof for residences, small buildings, and medium-large buildings; and steel or metal roofing sheets. SPCG Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SSP-R.BK.long_name: Sermsang Power Corporation Public Company Limited
SSP-R.BK.summary: Sermsang Power Corporation Public Company Limited operates in the renewable energy business. The company produces electricity through solar farm and rooftop, and wind farm projects. It operates 7 solar farms and 7 solar rooftop projects of 194 MWp in Thailand, Japan, Vietnam, Mongolia, and Indonesia; and 1 wind farm in Vietnam. The company distributes its electricity to state and publicly traded utility corporations and industrial users. It also provides investment and consultancy services. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SSP.BK.long_name: Sermsang Power Corporation Public Company Limited
SSP.BK.summary: Sermsang Power Corporation Public Company Limited operates in the renewable energy business. The company produces electricity through solar farm and rooftop, and wind farm projects. It operates 7 solar farms and 7 solar rooftop projects of 194 MWp in Thailand, Japan, Vietnam, Mongolia, and Indonesia; and 1 wind farm in Vietnam. The company distributes its electricity to state and publicly traded utility corporations and industrial users. It also provides investment and consultancy services. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

TPCH-R.BK.long_name: TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited
TPCH-R.BK.summary: TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and distributes renewable electricity in Thailand. It primarily generates electricity from biomass. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Polycons Public Company Limited.

TPCH.BK.long_name: TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited
TPCH.BK.summary: TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, generates and distributes renewable electricity in Thailand. It primarily generates electricity from biomass. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TPC Power Holding Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Thai Polycons Public Company Limited.

TPIPP-R.BK.long_name: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited
TPIPP-R.BK.summary: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity in Thailand. It operates through Energy & Utilities and Petrol and Gas Stations segments. The company operates refuse derived fuel fired, coal-fired, waste-to-energy, and waste-heat recovery power plants. It sells its electricity to the electricity generating authority of Thailand. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 8 power plants with a total installed power generation capacity of 440 megawatt, as well as 8 petrol stations, 3 petrol and gas stations, and a gas station under the TPIPP brand. It also manufactures and distributes organics waste. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of TPI Polene Public Company Limited.

TPIPP.BK.long_name: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited
TPIPP.BK.summary: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity in Thailand. It operates through Energy & Utilities and Petrol and Gas Stations segments. The company operates refuse derived fuel fired, coal-fired, waste-to-energy, and waste-heat recovery power plants. It sells its electricity to the electricity generating authority of Thailand. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 8 power plants with a total installed power generation capacity of 440 megawatt, as well as 8 petrol stations, 3 petrol and gas stations, and a gas station under the TPIPP brand. It also manufactures and distributes organics waste. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of TPI Polene Public Company Limited.

TSE-R.BK.long_name: Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited
TSE-R.BK.summary: Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited generates and distributes electricity from solar and biomass power plants to government and private sector in Thailand, Japan, and internationally. It also leases land, as well as provides maintenance service for power plants. The company was formerly known as Siam Solar Energy Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited in 2009. Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TTAPY.summary: TTW Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells treated water in Thailand. The company supplies water to the Provincial Waterworks Authority in the Amphur Nakorn Chaisri, Amphur Sam Pran, and Amphur Budha Monthon areas of Nakhon Pathom; and Amphur Muang and Amphur Kratumban areas of Samut Sakhon under the water purchase agreement. It is also involved in the management of water production and distribution systems, and waste water treatment systems; and operation and maintenance of water supply project. The company was formerly known as Thai Tap Water Supply Public Company Limited and changed its name to TTW Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Nakhon Pathom, Thailand.

UPA-R.BK.short_name: UNITED POWER OF ASIA PUBLIC COM
UPA-R.BK.long_name: United Power of Asia Public Company Limited
UPA-R.BK.summary: United Power of Asia Public Company Limited engages in the electricity generation and property development activities in Thailand. The company was formerly known as CyberPlanet Interactive Public Company Limited and changed its name to United Power of Asia Public Company Limited in May 2015. United Power of Asia Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UPA.BK.short_name: UNITED POWER OF ASIA PUBLIC COM
UPA.BK.long_name: United Power of Asia Public Company Limited
UPA.BK.summary: United Power of Asia Public Company Limited engages in the electricity generation and property development activities in Thailand. The company was formerly known as CyberPlanet Interactive Public Company Limited and changed its name to United Power of Asia Public Company Limited in May 2015. United Power of Asia Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

WHAUP-R.BK.long_name: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited
WHAUP-R.BK.summary: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited provides integrated utilities products and services in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Water Business, Power Business, and Holding Company. It procures and distributes raw water; produces and distributes industrial water; and provides wastewater treatment services to operators in industrial estates and industrial lands, as well as other consumers. The company also generates and distributes electricity. It operates three power plants with a capacity of 2,588 megawatts (MW) that utilize gas, coal, and water, as well as possesses a total renewable energy capacity of 18.9 MW, which comprises solar and waste to energy. The company was formerly known as Hemaraj Clean Water Company Limited and changed its name to WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited in August 2016. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Samut Prakarn, Thailand. WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of WHA Industrial Development Public Company Limited.

WHAUP.BK.long_name: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited
WHAUP.BK.summary: WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited provides integrated utilities products and services in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Water Business, Power Business, and Holding Company. It procures and distributes raw water; produces and distributes industrial water; and provides wastewater treatment services to operators in industrial estates and industrial lands, as well as other consumers. The company also generates and distributes electricity. It operates three power plants with a capacity of 2,588 megawatts (MW) that utilize gas, coal, and water, as well as possesses a total renewable energy capacity of 18.9 MW, which comprises solar and waste to energy. The company was formerly known as Hemaraj Clean Water Company Limited and changed its name to WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited in August 2016. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Samut Prakarn, Thailand. WHA Utilities and Power Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of WHA Industrial Development Public Company Limited.

WP-R.BK.summary: WP Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, trades in liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) under the World Gas brand name. The company operates through Sale of LPG and Transportation segments. It distributes LPG cylinder to the LPG gas filling plants, retail gas distributors, and industrial and household users, as well as offers specialized LPG cylinders for forklift trucks. The company also transports oil, gas, and chemical substances; operates gas station; produces and distributes electricity; and leases vehicles. WP Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
